column4: how can i solv this /etc/init.d/adsl-init: line 32: echo_success: command not found ?
open /etc/init.d/adsl-init  in a text editor , go to line 32 , look at whats being done , sound likes its just telling you it was ok , in which case you could chop of the offending bit of code
that probably won't do your installation much good
adsl is up but that command do not exist
